Package org.jtrim2.taskgraph

Class TaskGraphExecutorProperties

java.lang.Object
org.jtrim2.taskgraph.TaskGraphExecutorProperties
public class TaskGraphExecutorProperties extends Object
Defines the properties used to control task graph execution.

Instances of this class can can be instantiated through its TaskGraphExecutorProperties.Builder.

This class maybe extended by more specific implementations of the task execution framework.

Thread safety

Methods of this class are safely callable from multiple threads concurrently and the properties of TaskGraphExecutorProperties cannot be changed.

Synchronization transparency

The methods of this class are synchronization transparent.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • isDeliverResultOnFailure

      public final boolean isDeliverResultOnFailure()
      Returns true if results of the computation should be delivered even in case of failure. That is, if this flag is set, the task graph execution never completes exceptionally, instead it will always deliver a TaskGraphExecutionResult (even if canceled). So, if this flag is set, partial results can be retrieved.

      Note if this flag is set to true, it is recommended to set stopOnFailure to false as well. Otherwise, computation might get canceled on the first failure (and no partial results are provided).

      Returns:
      true if results of the computation should be delivered even in case of failure, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • isStopOnFailure()

    • isStopOnFailure

      public final boolean isStopOnFailure()
      Returns true if execution should be canceled after encountering the first failure.
      Returns:
      true if execution should be canceled after encountering the first failure, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • isDeliverResultOnFailure()

    • getComputeErrorHandler

      public final TaskErrorHandler getComputeErrorHandler()
      Returns the callback notified whenever a failure occurs while trying to execute the action of task node. The default callback simply logs the error on SEVERE level.
      Returns:
      the callback notified whenever a failure occurs while trying to execute the action of task node. This method never returns null.

    • getResultNodeKeys

      public final Set<TaskNodeKey<?,?>> getResultNodeKeys()
      Returns the set of TaskNodeKey identifying the nodes whose result are to be delivered to the TaskGraphExecutionResult. Attempting to retrieve the output via of node not specified by the returned set via the TaskGraphExecutionResult is the error of the caller.
      Returns:
      the set of TaskNodeKey identifying the nodes whose result are to be delivered to the TaskGraphExecutionResult. This method never returns null.
